text: Bud Wiener Park is an urban park located in Los Angeles City Council District 14, Los Angeles, California. It consists of a grassy play area stocked with benches and drinking fountains.http://www.laparks.org/park/budd-wiener LAParks ==References== Category:Parks in California Category:Parks in Los Angeles County, California Category:Parks in Los Angeles
title: Bud Wiener Park
